EXPERIMENTS

Journal Day 0

I have decided to start journaling from today onwards. Today is Sunday 7/11/2021. I did nothing special today and I did nothing special yesterday. I also expect to do nothing special tomorrow.
I did look up some really cool pictures of snowy terrain today.
I also relearned some JavaScript today like console.log(), which just logs things into the console.

And here is a nice haiku I found online: 

                    Winter by the pond
                    Ice hangs from a craggy tree
                    Where did the frogs go?
Side note: Scotland has 421 different words for snow. Some of them are: sneesl, feefle, and flinkdrinkin

To Do List

  1. Look for an apartment
  2. Clean up Github repositories
  3. Apply for jobs
  4. Bake that cake
